questions.question: RAM is volatile / RAM अस्थायी है – True or False? [SSC 2024]
questions.explanation: RAM is volatile — it loses its data when power is turned off.

questions.question: EPROM can be erased by ___. / EPROM को ___ द्वारा मिटाया जा सकता है। [SSC 2024]
questions.explanation: EPROM (Erasable Programmable ROM) can be erased by exposure to ultraviolet light.

questions.question: हार्ड डिस्क की गति को ___ में मापा जाता है / Hard disk speed is measured in: [SSC 2024]
questions.explanation: Hard disk speed is measured in RPM (Revolutions Per Minute).

questions.question: प्राइमरी मेमोरी में क्या-क्या शामिल है? / What is included in primary memory? [SSC 2024]
questions.explanation: Primary memory includes RAM and ROM.

questions.question: Which of the following is a non-impact printer? / निम्न में से कौन सा नॉन-इम्पैक्ट प्रिंटर है? [IBPS 2024]
questions.explanation: Laser printer is a non-impact printer that uses laser and toner.

questions.question: CRT stands for / CRT का पूर्ण रूप: [IBPS 2024]
questions.explanation: CRT stands for Cathode Ray Tube.

questions.question: Which memory is fastest? / सबसे तेज़ मेमोरी कौन सी है? [RRB 2024]
questions.explanation: Cache memory is the fastest type of memory, located closest to the CPU.

questions.question: Pen drive is connected to the computer using ___. / पेन ड्राइव कंप्यूटर से ___ के जरिये जोड़ी जाती है। [RRB 2024]
questions.explanation: Pen drive is connected via USB (Universal Serial Bus) port.

questions.question: CD-R stands for / CD-R का पूर्ण रूप: [SBI 2023]
questions.explanation: CD-R stands for Compact Disc Recordable.

questions.question: Which of these is NOT a secondary storage device? / इनमें से कौन सेकेंडरी स्टोरेज नहीं है? [SBI 2023]
questions.explanation: RAM is primary memory, not secondary storage.

questions.question: LCD stands for / LCD का पूर्ण रूप: [CCC 2024]
questions.explanation: LCD stands for Liquid Crystal Display.

questions.question: The resolution of a printer is measured in ___. / प्रिंटर का रिजोल्यूशन ___ में मापा जाता है। [CCC 2024]
questions.explanation: Printer resolution is measured in DPI (Dots Per Inch).

questions.question: Plotter is used mainly for ___. / प्लॉटर मुख्य रूप से ___ के लिए प्रयोग होता है। [CCC 2024]
questions.explanation: Plotter is mainly used for printing large-scale engineering and architectural drawings.

questions.question: SSD stands for / SSD का पूर्ण रूप: [SSC CGL 2023]
questions.explanation: SSD stands for Solid State Drive.

questions.question: Which port is used to connect the printer to the computer? / प्रिंटर को कंप्यूटर से जोड़ने के लिए कौन सा पोर्ट? [SSC CGL 2023]
questions.explanation: USB port is commonly used to connect printers to computers.

questions.question: DVD stands for / DVD का पूर्ण रूप: [RRB NTPC 2023]
questions.explanation: DVD stands for Digital Versatile Disc.

questions.question: Trackball is an alternative to ___. / ट्रैकबॉल ___ का विकल्प है। [RRB NTPC 2023]
questions.explanation: Trackball is an alternative pointing device to the mouse.

questions.question: What is the function of a heat sink in a computer? / कंप्यूटर में हीट सिंक का कार्य क्या है? [SSC CHSL 2023]
questions.explanation: A heat sink absorbs and dissipates heat to cool the CPU.

questions.question: Which bus carries data between CPU and memory? / CPU और मेमोरी के बीच डेटा कौन सा बस ले जाता है? [SSC CHSL 2023]
questions.explanation: Data Bus carries data between the CPU and memory.

questions.question: GPU stands for / GPU का पूर्ण रूप: [UPSC 2023]
questions.explanation: GPU stands for Graphics Processing Unit.

questions.question: Which of these is a volatile memory? / इनमें से कौन सी अस्थायी मेमोरी है? [UPSC 2023]
questions.explanation: RAM is a volatile memory that loses data when power is off.

questions.question: HDMI stands for / HDMI का पूर्ण रूप: [SSC MTS 2023]
questions.explanation: HDMI stands for High Definition Multimedia Interface.

questions.question: A storage device with no moving parts is ___. / बिना किसी हिलने वाले हिस्से वाला स्टोरेज डिवाइस: [SSC MTS 2023]
questions.explanation: SSD (Solid State Drive) has no moving parts.

questions.question: OCR stands for / OCR का पूर्ण रूप: [IBPS Clerk 2023]
questions.explanation: OCR stands for Optical Character Recognition.

questions.question: MICR is commonly used in ___. / MICR आमतौर पर ___ में प्रयोग होता है। [IBPS Clerk 2023]
questions.explanation: MICR (Magnetic Ink Character Recognition) is commonly used in banking for cheque processing.

questions.question: Which of the following is an impact printer? / निम्न में से कौन इम्पैक्ट प्रिंटर है? [SBI PO 2022]
questions.explanation: Dot matrix printer is an impact printer that prints by striking pins against an ink ribbon.

questions.question: Light pen is which type of device? / लाइट पेन किस प्रकार का डिवाइस है? [SBI PO 2022]
questions.explanation: Light pen is an input device used to select items on a screen.

questions.question: Which memory type is electrically erasable? / कौन सी मेमोरी विद्युत रूप से मिटाई जा सकती है? [SBI PO 2022]
questions.explanation: EEPROM (Electrically Erasable Programmable ROM) can be erased electrically.

questions.question: VGA stands for / VGA का पूर्ण रूप: [SSC CGL 2022]
questions.explanation: VGA stands for Video Graphics Array.

questions.question: OLED stands for / OLED का पूर्ण रूप: [SSC CGL 2022]
questions.explanation: OLED stands for Organic Light Emitting Diode.

questions.question: Which device is used to read barcodes? / बारकोड पढ़ने के लिए कौन सा उपकरण? [Delhi Police 2022]
questions.explanation: Barcode Reader/Scanner is used to read barcodes.

questions.question: Webcam is which type of device? / वेबकैम किस प्रकार का उपकरण है? [Delhi Police 2022]
questions.explanation: Webcam is an input device that captures video.

questions.question: The capacity of a floppy disk is ___. / फ्लॉपी डिस्क की क्षमता ___ होती है। [CRPF 2022]
questions.explanation: A standard 3.5-inch floppy disk has a capacity of 1.44 MB.

questions.question: Which type of ROM can be programmed once? / ROM का कौन सा प्रकार एक बार प्रोग्राम किया जा सकता है? [CRPF 2022]
questions.explanation: PROM (Programmable ROM) can be programmed only once.

questions.question: NIC stands for / NIC का पूर्ण रूप: [SBI Clerk 2022]
questions.explanation: NIC stands for Network Interface Card.

questions.question: Which of these is used for biometric authentication? / बायोमेट्रिक प्रमाणीकरण के लिए कौन सा उपयोग होता है? [SBI Clerk 2022]
questions.explanation: Fingerprint scanner is used for biometric authentication.

questions.question: PS/2 port is used to connect ___. / PS/2 पोर्ट ___ को जोड़ने के लिए प्रयोग होता है। [JKSSB 2022]
questions.explanation: PS/2 port is used to connect Keyboard and Mouse.

questions.question: Which bus is used to carry address signals? / एड्रेस सिग्नल ले जाने के लिए कौन सा बस? [JKSSB 2022]
questions.explanation: Address Bus is used to carry address signals.

questions.question: FireWire port is also known as ___. / फायरवायर पोर्ट को ___ भी कहते हैं। [RBI 2022]
questions.explanation: FireWire port is also known as IEEE 1394.

questions.question: DRAM needs to be refreshed ___. / DRAM को ___ रिफ्रेश करना पड़ता है। [RBI 2022]
questions.explanation: DRAM (Dynamic RAM) needs to be refreshed periodically to retain data.

questions.question: Which of the following is an optical storage device? / निम्न में से कौन ऑप्टिकल स्टोरेज? [CCC 2023]
questions.explanation: CD-ROM is an optical storage device that uses laser to read data.

questions.question: Touchpad is mainly used in ___. / टचपैड मुख्य रूप से ___ में प्रयोग होता है। [CCC 2023]
questions.explanation: Touchpad is mainly used in Laptops as a pointing device.

questions.question: Which device converts analog signal to digital? / कौन सा डिवाइस एनालॉग सिग्नल को डिजिटल में बदलता है? [CCC 2023]
questions.explanation: ADC (Analog to Digital Converter) converts analog signals to digital.

questions.question: Keyboard shortcut to open Task Manager in Windows is ___. / विंडोज में टास्क मैनेजर खोलने का शॉर्टकट: [SSC 2023]
questions.explanation: Ctrl + Alt + Delete opens the security screen from where Task Manager can be accessed.

questions.question: Which component controls the timing of computer operations? / कंप्यूटर ऑपरेशन की टाइमिंग को कौन नियंत्रित करता है? [SSC 2023]
questions.explanation: System Clock controls the timing and synchronization of computer operations.

questions.question: Which port provides the fastest data transfer? / कौन सा पोर्ट सबसे तेज़ डेटा ट्रांसफर देता है? [SSC 2023]
questions.explanation: USB 3.0 provides the fastest data transfer among the listed options (up to 5 Gbps).

questions.question: Magnetic ink is used in which technology? / चुंबकीय स्याही किस तकनीक में प्रयोग होती है? [IBPS PO 2023]
questions.explanation: Magnetic Ink is used in MICR (Magnetic Ink Character Recognition) technology.

questions.question: OMR is used to ___. / OMR का उपयोग ___ के लिए होता है। [IBPS PO 2023]
questions.explanation: OMR (Optical Mark Recognition) is used to read pencil marks on paper, such as exam answer sheets.

questions.question: Which memory is used as cache memory? / कैश मेमोरी के रूप में किसका उपयोग होता है? [IBPS PO 2023]
questions.explanation: SRAM (Static RAM) is used as cache memory because of its high speed.

questions.question: Which generation of computers used Integrated Circuits? / किस पीढ़ी के कंप्यूटर में IC का उपयोग हुआ? [SBI PO 2023]
questions.explanation: Third generation computers (1964-1971) used Integrated Circuits (ICs).

questions.question: Ethernet card is another name for ___. / इथरनेट कार्ड का दूसरा नाम: [SBI PO 2023]
questions.explanation: Ethernet card is another name for NIC (Network Interface Card).

questions.question: Which key is used to enter BIOS setup? / BIOS सेटअप में प्रवेश करने के लिए कौन सी कुंजी? [SBI PO 2023]
questions.explanation: Delete or F2 key is commonly used to enter BIOS setup during boot.

questions.question: The number of pixels displayed on the screen is called ___. / स्क्रीन पर प्रदर्शित पिक्सेल की संख्या को कहते हैं: [LIC 2023]
questions.explanation: Resolution is the number of pixels displayed on the screen.

questions.question: A joystick is mainly used for ___. / जॉयस्टिक मुख्य रूप से ___ के लिए प्रयोग होता है। [LIC 2023]
questions.explanation: A joystick is mainly used for gaming.

questions.question: Which of these is a magnetic storage device? / इनमें से कौन सा चुंबकीय स्टोरेज है? [LIC 2023]
questions.explanation: Hard Disk is a magnetic storage device.

questions.question: AGP stands for / AGP का पूर्ण रूप: [CDS 2023]
questions.explanation: AGP stands for Accelerated Graphics Port.

questions.question: PCI stands for / PCI का पूर्ण रूप: [CDS 2023]
questions.explanation: PCI stands for Peripheral Component Interconnect.

questions.question: LED stands for / LED का पूर्ण रूप: [MP Patwari 2023]
questions.explanation: LED stands for Light Emitting Diode.

questions.question: Which memory retains data permanently without power? / कौन सी मेमोरी बिना पावर के डेटा रखती है? [MP Patwari 2023]
questions.explanation: ROM (Read Only Memory) retains data permanently without power.

questions.question: Speakers are which type of device? / स्पीकर किस प्रकार का उपकरण है? [UPSSSC 2023]
questions.explanation: Speakers are output devices that produce sound.

questions.question: Which of these keyboard types uses rubber dome under the keys? / कौन सा कीबोर्ड प्रकार रबर डोम का उपयोग करता है? [UPSSSC 2023]
questions.explanation: Membrane keyboard uses rubber dome under the keys.

questions.question: Which device is used as a pointing device in laptops? / लैपटॉप में पॉइंटिंग डिवाइस के रूप में: [CG Vyapam 2023]
questions.explanation: Trackpad/Touchpad is the pointing device used in laptops.

questions.question: SMPS converts ___. / SMPS ___ रूपांतरित करता है। [CG Vyapam 2023]
questions.explanation: SMPS (Switch Mode Power Supply) converts AC to DC power for computer components.

questions.question: How many pins does a VGA connector have? / VGA कनेक्टर में कितने पिन होते हैं? [Navy 2022]
questions.explanation: A VGA connector has 15 pins.

questions.question: Which is the brain of the computer? / कंप्यूटर का मस्तिष्क कौन है? [Navy 2022]
questions.explanation: CPU (Central Processing Unit) is called the brain of the computer.

questions.question: Which type of monitor uses phosphor coating? / किस प्रकार का मॉनिटर फॉस्फर कोटिंग का उपयोग करता है? [DRDO 2022]
questions.explanation: CRT (Cathode Ray Tube) monitor uses phosphor coating on its screen.

questions.question: SATA stands for / SATA का पूर्ण रूप: [DRDO 2022]
questions.explanation: SATA stands for Serial Advanced Technology Attachment.

questions.question: Blu-ray disc was developed by ___. / ब्लू-रे डिस्क किसने विकसित की? [GATE 2022]
questions.explanation: Blu-ray disc was developed by the Blu-ray Disc Association.

questions.question: Which port supports hot swapping? / कौन सा पोर्ट हॉट स्वैपिंग सपोर्ट करता है? [GATE 2022]
questions.explanation: USB supports hot swapping (connecting/disconnecting without shutting down).

questions.question: Which type of printer uses heat to transfer ink? / कौन सा प्रिंटर स्याही ट्रांसफर के लिए गर्मी का उपयोग करता है? [ISRO 2022]
questions.explanation: Thermal printer uses heat to transfer ink or activate special thermal paper.
